query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST116 SET CS116_BHD = #ENDDATE#, CS116_BMT = #ENDDATE#, CS116_BCD = HEX(CURRENT DATE), CS116_BCJ = #G_USER_ID#, UPDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.10.29 Han J.H UPZET = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.10.29 Han J.H WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = #PJT# AND CS116_HNO = #HNO# AND CS116_SEQ = #SEQ#
